titles.diagnostic: The ADHD Productivity Lies ‘WTF Happened’ Test: Did Your To-Do List Explode?
titles.emergency: 🚨 EMERGENCY PROTOCOL: To-Do List Overload + Panic Attack
titles.solution: How to Actually Use a To-Do List When Your Brain Hates Structure (Without Setting It on Fire)

hook: You know why to-do lists fail. Your brain treats ‘urgent’ like a suggestion box at the DMV. The brutal truth? You’ve stared at the same list for 3 weeks straight. PS: 98% of ADHDers abandon to-do lists within 7 days. → Translation: Your brain sees a to-do list as a personal attack.
voice_combat: Hey Google how to make a to-do list that works for ADHD
Alexa why do I hate to-do lists so much

internal_links.meme_grenade: “ADHD productivity methods often lead to feeling more overwhelmed” – Science, probably.

conversion_nuke.hook: Your amygdala will scream ‘Don’t open this, it's more work!’. DEFY IT. Click in 9 seconds or your to-do list wins.
